SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.lti

Class LtiServlet

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
org.opencastproject.lti.LtiServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class LtiServlet extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
A servlet to accept an LTI login via POST. The actual authentication happens in LtiProcessingFilter. GET requests produce JSON containing the LTI parameters passed during LTI launch.
See Also:
